PP8473_syn_1:
Emergency Bronchoscopy.
Indication: Central airway obstruction (RML).
Event: Massive hemoptysis (300mL) during debulking.
Action: Hemostasis (blocker/epi). Stent placed (14x40mm).
Dispo: ICU, intubated.
PP8473_syn_2: OPERATIVE SUMMARY: Ms. [REDACTED] underwent therapeutic bronchoscopy for RML tumor debulking. The procedure was complicated by massive hemoptysis estimated at 300mL. Hemodynamic stability was maintained while hemostasis was achieved using a bronchial blocker and iced saline. A 14x40mm silicone stent was deployed to secure the airway and tamponade the bleeding vessel. The patient was transferred to the MICU intubated for monitoring.
PP8473_syn_3:
Codes: 31641 (Tumor destruction), 31636 (Stent placement - bronchial).
Context: Complex therapeutic bronchoscopy.
Complication: Severe hemorrhage requiring tamponade.
Device: Silicone stent 14x40mm.
Disposition: Critical care.
PP8473_syn_4:
Resident Note
Patient: [REDACTED]
Procedure: Therapeutic Bronchoscopy
- RML tumor debulking started.
- Massive bleeding occurred.
- Blocked RML, used epi/ice.
- Placed silicone stent.
- Bleeding stopped.
- Patient remains intubated in ICU.
PP8473_syn_5: barbara kim 69 female therapeutic bronch for rml obstruction. started debulking with apc and cautery then massive bleeding started like 300ml. scary moment. put a blocker in and used ice. put a stent in 14 by 40 silicone. bleeding stopped. keep her asleep in the icu check blood counts.

PP8473_syn_7:
[Indication]
RML Tumor Obstruction.
[Anesthesia]
General, ETT.
[Description]
Debulking initiated. Complicated by massive hemoptysis. Hemostasis achieved. Silicone stent placed (14x40mm).
[Plan]
MICU admission. Mechanical ventilation.
PP8473_syn_8: [REDACTED] intended to clear a tumor blocking her right middle airway. During the removal process, she experienced severe bleeding. We acted quickly to block the area and apply cold saline to stop the flow. We then placed a silicone stent to keep the airway open and put pressure on the bleeding site. She is currently stable but remains on a ventilator in the ICU for close watching.
PP8473_syn_9: Pt: [REDACTED]. PROCEDURE: Therapeutic bronchoscopy. INTERVENTION EXECUTED: RML tumor debulking. Massive hemoptysis during procedure. Controlled with: epi, iced saline, blocker in RML. Silicone stent 14x40mm deployed. COMPLICATION: MAJOR AIRWAY HEMORRHAGE. CURRENT STATUS: Still intubated, sedated. TRANSFERRED TO: MICU.
